Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Tigers are riding a five-game winning streak and are currently the hottest team in baseball.
Mason Englert will be making his first start of the season for the Tigers after 11 relief appearances.
Manager A.J. Hinch has been effectively managing a shortage of starting pitchers by using several openers each turn through the rotation.
Griffin Canning will be starting for the Angels, making his 27th appearance of the season with a record of 4-11 and a 5.18 ERA.
The Tigers are sizable favorites for the game with a -165 listing, implying a 62.1 percent chance to win.
